Articles.Content: I would like to see missions that the game tasks you to do. An example would be to Put this satellite in orbit at 150 km. Or build a station with these requirements and earn science and money for doing them. Another one would be to build a colony on a given body. What do you think?
Yah, those things were added a few updates ago.
I would like to see a game where you could piece together rockets and launch them into space and go visit other planets. That would be awesome.

I would like to see a game where you could piece together rockets and launch them into space and go visit other planets. That would be awesome.

I want little green man with big heads as crew!

I am thinking the idea is for player-created missions, maybe? Hard to figure from just the title alone.

Would be cool if we can trade reputation to "buy" certain missions where we can specify targets and stuff. Though not sure how much sense that would make.
Move along, people. As we know, Contracts were added some months ago.
